```python
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|Remote|GUI)\s+(System|GUI)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(network|device|GUI)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(AV|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard\ disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|will)\s+(display|receive|send)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(each|the)\s+(device|status|request|downlink|position|icon|indicator)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [word for word in software_system if word.isupper()]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [word for word in physical_device if word.islower() and word not in ['the', 'a', 'an']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [word for word in environment_object if word.islower() and word not in ['the', 'a', 'an']]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [word for word in external_system if word.islower() and word not in ['the', 'a', 'an']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [word for word in system_requirements if word.isupper()]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word.islower() and word not in ['the', 'a', 'an']]

    return entities

```python
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],

        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s*Tactical\s*Control\s*System\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The Tactical Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*[a-z]+\b'
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*[a-z]+\b'
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*[a-z]+\b'
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[can|shall|must|is|are|be|has|have|had|do|does|did|will|would|could|should|ought|may|might|must|need|ought|shall|should|will|would]\b'
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    system_requirements = [re.sub(r'\b[can|shall|must|is|are|be|has|have|had|do|does|did|will|would|could|should|ought|may|might|must|need|ought|shall|should|will|would]\b', '', sentence).split('and')]
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*[a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|receive|translate|generate)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|receive|translate|generate)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+hardware\s+configuration"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match.strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|receive|translate|generate)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+information"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.strip())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall be capable of being interoperable with Predator and Outrider UAVs across the 5 levels of UAV interaction."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'The\s\w+\sshall\sprovide\sthe\scapability\s.*',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

```python
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Loop through each word

        # Check if the word is a Software System
        if word.lower() == 'system':
            entities['Software System'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a Physical Device
        elif word.lower() == 'device':
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is an Environment Object
        elif word.lower() == 'object':
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is an External System
        elif word.lower() == 'system':
            entities['External System'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a System Requirements
        elif word.lower() == 'requirement':
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a Shared Phenomena
        elif word.lower() == 'phenomena':
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)
    
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import json
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk.corpus import wordnet

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Tokenize the sentence into words
    words = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Loop through each word
    for word in words:
        # Check if the word is a Software System
        if word.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a Physical Device
        elif word.lower() in ['device', 'hardware']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is an Environment Object
        elif word.lower() in ['object', 'environment']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is an External System
        elif word.lower() in ['system', 'database']:
            entities['External System'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a System Requirements
        elif word.lower() in ['requirement', 'requirement']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a Shared Phenomena
        elif word.lower() in ['phenomena', 'event']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)
    
    # Use WordNet to find synonyms
    for word in words:
        synonyms = set()
        for syn in wordnet.synsets(word):
            for lemma in syn.lemmas():
                synonyms.add(lemma.name())
        for entity_type in entities:
            if word.lower() in synonyms:
                entities[entity_type].append(word)
    
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(DigitalHome|System|UAV|Device|System|Application)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(UAV|Device|Printer|Scanner|Monitor|Keyboard|Mouse|Tablet|Laptop|Smartphone|Tablet|Camera|Printer|Scanner|Monitor|Keyboard|Mouse|Tablet|Laptop|Smartphone|Camera)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an|this|that|these|those|this|that|these|those)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|disk|stripe|tap|hard|disk|database|card|disk|stripe|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(initiate|change|include|manual|override|flight|behaviors|send|proper|control|commands|start|stop|operation|configuration|setup|make|changes|establish|user|accounts)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an|this|that|these|those|this|that|these|those|configuration|operation|setup|make|changes|establish|user|accounts)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\santenna\b|\b\w+\scontroller\b|\b\w+\smodule\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\smagnetic\b|\b\w+\stap\b|\b\w+\shard\sbisk\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\sfunctionality\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\scommunications\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities('The Tactical Control System shall provide the functionality to control the ADT antenna.'))
print(extract_entities('The Gateway shall contain an RF Module, which shall send and receive wireless communications between the Gateway and the other DigitalHome devices (sensors and controllers).'))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Tactical|Monitor|Control)\s+System"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('the Monitor and Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Monitor|Control)\s+System"
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('the Monitor and Control System')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:patient|sun|old)"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('the patient')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard\sdisk)"
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('the database')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"sufficient\s+cues\s+to\s+the\s+operator\s+to\s+implement\s+and\s+monitor\s+automatic\s+launch\s+and\s+recovery,\s+and\s+to\s+initiate\s+abort\s+procedures\s+if\s+required"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('sufficient cues to the operator to implement and monitor automatic launch and recovery, and to initiate abort procedures if required')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"status\s+and\s+error\s+messages"
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('status and error messages')

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\b\w+\b', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities['Software System'] = [system.split('shall')[0].strip() for system in software_system]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+is\s+set\s+\w+', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities['Physical Device'] = [device.split('is set')[0].strip() for device in physical_device]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+has\s+\w+', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = [object.split('has')[0].strip() for object in environment_object]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\w+', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = [system.split('shall')[1].strip() for system in external_system]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\w+', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement.split('shall')[1].strip() for requirement in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+is\s+set\s+\w+', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomena.split('is set')[1].strip() for phenomena in shared_phenomena]

    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|APA|AV|System)\s+Control|System'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(AV|AVionics|System|Device)\s+status|location|flight|avionics|system|status'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(personnel|patient|sun|old)\s+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|card|tap|disk)\s+'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to|include|but|not|be|limited|to)\s+(the|a|an)\s+(AV|System|status|location|flight|avionics|system|status)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[3] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(AV|System|status|location|flight|avionics|system|status|phenomena)\s+'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[3] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sSystem"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sExpansion"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\scompute\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sposition"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
    # Shared Phenomena
```

        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+s?\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+s?\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+s?\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+s?\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+s?\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(APA|air|ground|data|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(air|ground|vehicle|device|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|time|vehicle|system)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|card|tap|disk|system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(no|safety|requirement|aim|purpose|system|to|be|developed)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(concurrent|communications|time|vehicle|system|same|event|state|value|between|connected|entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Requirements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function

```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+ database\b|\b\w+ card\b|\b\w+ disk\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+ shall\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+ identifier\b|\b\w+ terminal\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Software|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(device|terminal|switch|card|disk|tap|stripe|control|mode|selection|override|override|mode|selection)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(user|patient|sun|old|operator|Emission|Hazards|Electromagnetic|Radiation|Ordnance|Control|EMCON|HERO|condition)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|disk|tap|stripe|control|mode|selection|override|override|mode|selection)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(require|aim|purpose|desired|planned|default|selection|override|mode|selection)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(state|time|period|event|value|condition|selection|override|mode|selection)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(Tactical Control System|Monitor and Control System|LOS antenna|ship|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(LOS antenna|ship|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|correlator|antenna)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(obstructions|patient|sun|old)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(switch to a second LOS antenna|allow correlator power monitoring and control to continue)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(\w+\s\w+|masking|failure|network)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s+shall\s+\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s+(?:the)?\s*Tactical Control System\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('the Tactical Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bantenna pedestal\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('antenna pedestal')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bplatform\b|\bship\b|\bHMMWV\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('platform')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('ship')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('HMMWV')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'status and error messages'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('status and error messages')

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in software_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(word)

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in physical_devices:
        if word.lower() in ['device', 'terminal', 'request']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in environment_objects:
        if word.lower() in ['operator', 'user', 'desired']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in external_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(word)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in system_requirements:
        if word.lower() in ['function', 'selection', 'desired']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in shared_phenomena:
        if word.lower() in ['data', 'selection', 'desired']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities('The operator shall be able to manually override the automatic function selection of the selected data terminal, if desired.'))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sModule\b|\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\scontroller\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\scommunications\b|\b\w+\sdata\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Software|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Device|Card|Disk|Tap|Stripe|Storage)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|auditors|user|system|activity|data|information|message|event|state|value|entity)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|disk|tap|stripe|storage|system|network|server|computer)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(examine|analyse|utilize|store|send|receive|get|access|modify|delete|update|create|read|write|insert|delete|update|create)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(event|state|value|data|information|message|activity|system|user|entity)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    }

        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
```

```python
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements

    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Monitor|Control)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|be|capable)\s+of\s+(receiving|sending|storing)\s+(secondary|primary)\s+HAE\s+UAV\s+payload\s+imagery'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(status|error|messages)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Center|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Device|Monitor|Screen|Display|Printer|Scanner|Camera|Sensor|Actuator|Controller|Motor|Motor|Motor)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Patient|User|Target|Object|Point|Area|Location|Device|System|Environment|World|Sun|Old|Person|People|Group|Groups)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(Database|Card|Tap|Disk|Drive|Server|Client|Network|System|Computer|Machine|Device|Controller|Actuator|Sensor|Motor|Motor|Motor)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(Have|Should|Must|Can|Be|Is|Are|Am|Is|Are|Has|Have|Had|Will|Would|Shall|Should|Must|Can|Be|Is|Are|Am|Is|Are|Has|Have|Had)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Target|Point|Area|Location|Device|System|Environment|World|Sun|Old|Person|People|Group|Groups|Message|Information|Data|Value|State|Event|Events|States|Values|Beacons|On|Off|Icon|Icons|Cross|Hairs|Similar|Other|Types|Several|Select|Deselect|Identify|Selected|Capability|Select|Deselect|Identify|Selected|Point|Target)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ the [a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ database\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ shall have the capability to\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ imagery\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
```

```python
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    import json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ and\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ data\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ the [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bshall have the capability to\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ data\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'The\s\w+\sshall\s\w+\sto\s\w+\s.*',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) infrastructure'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)s'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) database'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) between'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) data|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) information'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2).strip())

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities('This Center-to-Center infrastructure implements a repository for traffic data and provides a mechanism to exchange device control information between TMCs.'))
print(extract_entities('Record traffic is defined as operational/voice communications.'))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system\s+layers'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+data\s+bust\s+messages'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+comply'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+messages'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

        'System Requirements': [],

    }

```python
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(ASPERA-3|Tactical Control System|MEX OA)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(analog imagery|RS-170A|overlay)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the ASPERA-3 Co-Is|the ASPERA-3 team)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(APAF)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(send and receive analog imagery in RS-170A format with as well as without overlay|meeting MEX mission goals and objectives)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA telemetry)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Specific data sets required by the Backend Data Processing System will be provided in a timely and robust fashion over a secondary virtual network."))
print(extract_entities("Processing will include formatting, storing, routing, and display."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(CCTNS|Tactical Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(device|computer|machine|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|card|disk|stripe)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(error|message|check|correct|possible)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(error|message|digital|system|control)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("All error messages produced by the CCTNS system must be meaningful, so that they can be appropriately acted upon by the users who are likely to see them."))
print(extract_entities("All digital messages received by the Tactical Control System shall be automatically checked for errors and corrected when possible."))
```

```python
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(aim|purpose|system|to|be|developed)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bshall\s+provide\s+the\s+capability\s+to\s+[A-Z][a-z]+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ messages\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bshall be capable of\b|shall process and transfer\b|shall monitor\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ messages\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',

        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ data and [a-z]+ data\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[can|shall|must|should|may|will|is|are|am|be|been|being|has|have|had|do|does|did|to|for|with|from|by|in|on|at|of|and|or|but|if|as|under|into|during|while|until|before|after|on|upon|down|in|through|across|above|below|over|under|around|with|against|between|into|toward|onto|off|on|over|past|up|down|by|from|out|on|to|at|with|under|about|along|across|alongside|amid|among|an|and|any|are|as|at|be|because|been|being|but|by|can|cannot|could|did|do|does|doing|don't|down|during|each|else|even|ever|every|for|from|further|get|got|had|has|have|he|him|his|how|if|in|into|is|it|its|just|keep|know|known|let|like|likely|may|me|might|more|most|must|my|neither|never|no|not|now|of|off|on|one|only|or|other|our|out|over|said|see|seem|seemed|seeming|seems|should|since|so|some|something|sometimes|somewhere|still|such|take|than|that|the|their|them|then|there|these|they|this|those|though|through|thus|to|too|took|under|until|up|upon|us|very|was|were|what|when|where|which|while|whither|who|whole|why|will|with|within|without|would|yet|you|your'].split(),
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Extract entities
    entities = {}
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        entities[entity_type] = []
        for match in re.findall(pattern, sentence):
            entities[entity_type].append(match)

    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ devices\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+s?\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ database\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ events\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (shall|needs|require|must) (a|an) (robust|secure|reliable|efficient) (security|mechanism|system|solution)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (can|is|has) (send|receive|get|put) (data|information)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (are|is|has) (shared|common|public)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (can|is|has) (store|save|keep) (data|information)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (shall|needs|require|must) (be|have) (secure|reliable|efficient|fast)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (are|is|has) (shared|common|public)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Device|Equipment|Hardware)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(Patient|Object|Entity|Thing)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(Database|Card|Disk|System)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(Capability|Parameter|Function|Operation)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(Event|State|Value|Status)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall\s+restrict\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ access|([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ capability) via password protection)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ events|([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ states) and values between the connected entities'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'to \w+|shall \w+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'limited|real-time|auto correlation'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```
