import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = sentence.split()
    
    # Define the keywords for each entity type
    keywords = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'application', 'program'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'machine', 'equipment', 'instrument'],
        'Environment Object': ['object', 'entity', 'thing', 'item'],
        'External System': ['database', 'file', 'system', 'repository'],
        'System Requirements': ['requirement', 'need', 'goal', 'objective'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value', 'phenomenon']
    }
    
    # Iterate over each token
    for token in tokens:
        # Iterate over each entity type
        for entity_type, keyword_list in keywords.items():
            # Check if the token matches any keyword
            if any(token.lower() == keyword.lower() for keyword in keyword_list):
                # Add the token to the corresponding entity list
                entities[entity_type].append(token)
    
    # Return the entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Requirements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Tactical|System|Control|Monitor|Correlator|Power|Control|System|Monitor|Control)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(device|card|disk|stripe|tap|system|monitor|control)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|system|monitor|control)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|disk|stripe|tap|system|monitor|control)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(status|monitoring|alerting|parameter|threshold|support|automated|system|software|preset|set|goes|over|under)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(event|state|value|system|monitor|control)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\w+\s+be\s+implemented\s+using\s+\w+\b', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities['Software System'] = [software_system[0].split('shall')[0].strip()]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+be\s+implemented\s+using\s+\w+\b', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities['Physical Device'] = [physical_device[0].split('shall')[0].strip()]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+be\s+implemented\s+using\s+\w+\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = [environment_object[0].split('shall')[0].strip()]
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+be\s+implemented\s+using\s+\w+\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = [external_system[0].split('shall')[0].strip()]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\w+\s+in\s+favour\s+of\s+\w+\s+information\s+display', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = [system_requirements[0]]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+be\s+implemented\s+using\s+\w+\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [shared_phenomena[0].split('shall')[0].strip()]
    
    return entities

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+HCI\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+AV\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+station\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+database\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+control\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+operations\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

    # System Requirements

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\w+\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+\w+\s+in\s+other\s+centers'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().split('shall')[1].split('be')[0].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s+control\s+command\s+for\s+a\s+\w+'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group().split('for')[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s+waypoints|Launch\s+and\s+Recovery\s+Point|the\s+\w+'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group().strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s+database|a\s+magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|a\s+tap|hard\s+disk'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group().strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'The\s+\w+\s+shall\s+provide\s+the\s+capability\s+to\s+\w+'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s+zones|waypoints|Launch\s+and\s+Recovery\s+Point|the\s+\w+flight\s+path|username|Password'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group().strip())

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    physical_device += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\bthe [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ subsystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+ object\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+ requirement\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+ phenomenon\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',

        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to be [a-z]+ and [a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+ data\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
